title: The Systematic Brainwashing of America | Guest: Candace Owens | Daily Best of March 30 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Candace Owens joins us to discuss her personal journey from liberal to conservative and explains the ongoing attack on family values perpetrated by the mainstream media and the education system. Senator "Coach" Tommy Tuberville joins us to talk about prioritizing our national security before we address climate change. In other news, we can't help but get our hopes up for the new "Top Gun" movie. O.J. Simpson and Jim Carrey weigh in on the Will Smith slap. And lastly, comments from the Disney corporate president continue the trend of Disney alienating its core audience.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
